description:
We've got a huge collection of games with controls so simple anyone can enjoy!
Pass around the Joy-Conâ„¢ controllers and play with up to six players!

There are plenty of intuitive and easy-to-play minigames for everyone!
Enjoy finding your new favorite!

Free Mode
Choose the game you want to play and have a blast!

Festival Mode
Play your chosen games in order to become the champ!

Online Mode
Battle online against your friends and players the world over!
name: Summer Party Time
intro:
Get ready for the best summer ever!
Party with your friends anytime, anywhere!
